name: Post Denmark
description:
Punch your way through a post apocalyptic Denmark

Credits:

Bertram Pinstrup Jensen 17 years
Rasmus Bay Thomsen 20 years
Rolf Axel Jacobsen 18 years

Shores of Avalon by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4349-shores-of-avalon
License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

Controller strongly recommended

Controls:

Keyboard:
A - D: Left - Right
Space: Jump
Glove: point with cursor and left click to use

Controller:
L-stick: Left - Right
L2/LT: Jump
R-stick: Glove
R2/RT: Glove punch

Keep in mind: You can only use the glove on metalic objects

Tested for keyboard and PS4 Controller
